galleryImages.alt_text: Modern 3-BHK Villa exterior view showcasing contemporary architecture with East facing orientation
galleryImages.quote: A house built for multipurpose somewhat designed to separate in blocks so that they can use it as a home now and in the future give it to the upcoming family. A house that is still connected to each other on the first floor.

galleryImages.alt_text: Cozy 2-BHK Home interior view displaying efficient space planning and modern amenities
galleryImages.quote: Built for three brothers and parents and inclusive house yet providing enough privacy and space to each family.

galleryImages.alt_text: Luxury 4-BHK Duplex building elevation featuring premium finishes and spacious design
galleryImages.quote: Compact 3BHK home built on a 370 Sqft plot. A lot of design and expertise is required to build such homes and ensuring it fits a family comfortably was our goal.

commitmentSection.title: Our Commitment to Quality
commitmentSection.description: At Sunbrix, quality isn't a feature, it's the foundation of everything we do. For over 20 years, we've crafted homes that last and function with purpose, building each one with care in every corner and meaning in every brick laid.

features.title: Design & Strength
features.description: At Sunbrix, we build and designs, using time tested practices.

features.title: 20 year warranty
features.description: At Sunbrix, we proudly offer a 20 year warranty on our homes.

features.title: 100% On time delivery
features.description: The past 20 years, Sunbrix has never delayed a single project.

features.title: High quality materials
features.description: At Sunbrix, Using the best quality materials is simply the norm.
